revised_title: Investigations in the Infra-Red Region of the Spectrum: The Absorption Spectrum and Molecular Structure of Boron Trichloride
tldr: The authors investigate the absorption spectrum and molecular structure of boron trichloride in the infra-red region. They study the effect of strain on plane groups of molecules and determine the force constants of the bonds. The findings contribute to understanding the behavior of molecules under strain and the molecular structure of boron trichloride.
